name: Peaceful Dark
description:
A short, experimental game to test out the 3D sound features in Unity. Navigate the puzzles using only your hearing! To give a little backstory to the project, this was originally a concept I had tried to create in GameMaker, however the audio was not as streamlined as I found it was in Unity3D – hence my use of UNity for this project!

This one won't see any more development, but may inspire a future, larger project of mine. Comments are appreciated!

A note that I don't have a good way to test the windows version at the moment, so if there are any issues using it, please leave a comment and I'll look into it as soon as possible!

Sounds I did not create can be found at these links.
The song is Fretless by Kevin MacLeod.

"Fretless" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
